text:
Mu myaka ya vuba aha, inkuru itangaje yavuzwe hirya no hino ku isi, ivuga ku muhanzi w'icyamamare witwa Amara Ndizeye. Uyu muhanzi ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Rwanda, yakoze igitamo cyahinduye uburyo isi yakiraga umuziki, igikorwa cye gituma abantu benshi bamutangarira ndetse bakanamukomera amashyi.

Amara Ndizeye yakuze akunda umuziki cyane, akenshi yirirwaga aririmba avanga n'ijwi ryo kuvuza iningiri yari yaragabiwe na sekuru. N'ubwo ubuzima bwe bw'ubwana bwari bugoye kubera kuba mu muryango ufite amikoro make, ibi ntibyamubujije gukomeza gukurikirana inzozi ze zo kuba umuhanzi. Yagiye yitabira amarushanwa y'impano hirya no hino, cyane cyane mu birori by'ishuri, akagenda agaragaza ubuhanga butangaje.

Nyuma yo gusoza amashuri yisumbuye, Amara yagiye mu mujyi wa Kigali gushaka amahirwe yo kumenyekanisha impano ye. Yagiye atangira gucuranga mu tubari duto ndetse n'ahandi abantu bakunda umuziki, agerageza kwigarurira imitima y'abakunzi be. Amahirwe yaje kumusekera ubwo umwe mu bahanga mu gukora umuziki wo muri Amerika yageraga i Kigali mu rugendo rw'akazi. Uwo muhanzi yahise anyurwa no kumva ijwi rya Amara, byongeye, ngo nawe yashakaga gucurangira uyu mugabo.

Umunyamerika yamusabye gukorana indirimbo imwe, ari nayo yahinduye ubuzima bwe burundu. Iyo ndirimbo yiswe "Ukuhira Inzozi" yaje kuba icyamamare mu buryo bw'igitangaza. Indirimbo irimo amagambo y'urukundo kandi yuzuye ubutumwa bwo guhumuriza abantu kugira ngo bakomeze gukurikira inzozi zabo n'ubwo imihanda iba igoye.

Igitangaje, si ubuhanga bw'iyi ndirimbo gusa ahubwo ni uburyo Amara yayishingiye ku mateka ye bwite. Yaririmbye uburyo yanyuze mu bibazo bitandukanye ariko agakomeza kwizera ubuzima bumushya imbere. Indirimbo yubakiye ku mudiho woroheje uvanzemo injyana gakondo y'iwabo, bigafasha kumva neza ubutumwa yatangaga.

Byahise byigarurira imitima y'abantu benshi, haba mu Rwanda ndetse no hanze yacyo. Indirimbo yahise iba iyambere ku matelevisiyo ndetse n'insakazamajwi zikomeye ku isi, ifata imyanya ya mbere ku mbuga zicururizwaho umuziki nka Spotify na Apple Music.

Amara Ndizeye yakoze cyane kugira ngo azanemo udushya mu bikorwa bye by'ubuhanzi. We nta kindi yifuzaga uretse guhindura umuziki, akoresheje impano ye. Yaje gutumirwa mu bitaramo bikomeye byinshi ku isi hose, ndetse atangira gukusanya imidari n'ibihembo bikomeye muri muzika. Indirimbo "Ukuhira Inzozi" yararirimbwe muri shampiyona mpuzamahanga y'imbirimbiri, ndetse y'ikigo gikomeye cyikodesha filime kuyikoresha mu mashusho yabo.

Mu bihe byose bitazibagirana, Amara yabereye urugero rwiza urubyiruko rwashakaga guhamya ibirindiro mu buhanzi. Yerekanye ko bishoboka ko umuntu asohoka mu bibazo byose, igikenewe ari ukwizera impano ndetse no gukora cyane. Ubu, Amara ni izina rikomeye kandi ntiyicaye kuko akomeje gukora n'izindi ndirimbo nziza, zinogeye amatwi y'abakunzi b'umuziki ku isi hose.

Mu myaka ya vuba, umuhanzi uzwi ku isi hose witwa Kiza Muntu yaciye agahigo kadasanzwe mu ruganda rwa muzika. Inkuru ye yahumekeye abantu benshi ndetse igafasha benshi gukomeza kwizera inzozi zabo, maze ikaba ari nayo mpamvu twafashe umwanya wo kuyibagezaho.

Kiza Muntu yavukiye mu muryango usanzwe mu karere ka Huye, mu Rwanda. Kuva akiri muto, Kiza yakundaga umuziki ndetse akunda gusubiramo indirimbo zabahanzi bakomeye bo mu Rwanda no ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ariko, nk'uko akenshi bigenda mu buzima, yahuye n'imbogamizi nyinshi mu rugendo rwe rwa muzika.

Mu gihe abandi bana bagenzi be bajyaga gukina umupira nyuma y'amasomo, Kiza we yahungiraga mu mahema mato bakoreshaga mu mashuri yigamo, aho yahinduraga ibikoresho by'akazi byose bikaba ibicurangisho by'ubwo bwoko bwe bw'umuziki. Akenshi yaterwaga isoni n'ijwi rye ryavugiraga hejuru cyane ndetse rimwe na rimwe akabanza gutitira bituma atavumbura impano ye byoroshye.

Icyakora, umunsi umwe ibintu byarahindutse. Umwigisha umwe muri iryo shuri yahisemo kumutega amatwi, maze asanga Kiza afite amajwi akomeye; aramubwira ati: "Umugaroro ujyana umuziki uzawukorere imbere y’Isi yose." Ijambo rimwe ritangaje, ariko rikomeye, ryahinduye amateka ya Kiza. Guhera uwo munsi, yateganyaga umwanya uhagije wo guhimba no gushyira mu bikorwa imyitozo y'umuziki ku buryo buhozaho.

Kugira ngo areme igitamo gikomeye, Kiza yagize amahirwe yo guhura n'abatunganya umuziki b'inararibonye nyuma yo gutsinda amarushanwa y’igihugu mu ndirimbo. Bari abanyabigango mu myigishirize y'umuziki kandi bakoze cyane birenze imipaka y’igihugu. Bazanye amajwi mashya ahuza umuziki wa gakondo n’umuziki wa kizungu, byatanze umusaruro ukomeye.

Indirimbo "Izuba Rirenga," iyo Kiza yashyize hanze, yahise isakara hirya no hino ku isi. Iki gitamo cyageze mu nkingi z'icyubahiro mu gihe kitazwi kandi cyashimishije abantu b'ingeri zose. Cyavugaga ku guharanira amahoro, urukundo, n'ubumwe. Ni umuziki wavugaga ururimi mpuzamahanga, ugakuraho imipaka n'iminzi.

Kiza Muntu yabaye intyazo mu bitaramo byinshi mpuzamahanga, yibutsa kuri Afurika ishema, kandi yatumye abantu b’ibihumbi n’ibihumbi biyumvamo ishema ridasanzwe. Indirimbo ye "Izuba Rirenga" yageze ku rutonde rw’ibyamamare cyane ku isi, ndetse yegukana ibihembo bikomeye birimo Grammy Awards.

Mu bihe bigoye cyangwa ibihe by'amajyambere, inkuru ya Kiza Muntu itanga ikizere ku myaka myinshi iri imbere. Byinshi by’agaciro, ni urugero ko nta kintu kiruta ugukurikira inzozi zawe kimwe n'uko akuru kaciye iminsi katendera intumwa. Ntitwakwibagirwa ko Kiza yahagarariye igihugu mu buryo bwose bw'imurikagurisha n'ibiganiro byo mu ngozi n'ahandi henshi. Amenya gukoresha ubushobozi bwe kugeza nyuma yo kubushira kumurongo.

Uyu muhanzi akomeje gukora ubuhanzi busa n’indashyikirwa atari uko gusa yimakaza umutuzo n’inzozi, ahubwo kuko afatiye urugero rwiza ku rubyiruko rw’i Rwanda no ku isi yose. Inkuru ye iratangaje kandi irinda ikomeza gushyirwa mu ngero z’igitangaza ku isi. Ibanga rye ni umukino w’akaga afite mu maraso ye y’ubuhanzi, n'umurava uhahanya cyangwa uzahora wivugira.

Mu gihugu cy'i Ngirimata, havuzwe inkuru idasanzwe mu gihugu hose iturutse ku muhanzi w’icyamamare witwa Kayizari. Kayizari, wari umaze imyaka myinshi akora umuziki, yamenyekanye cyane ku bw'igitamo yari amaze gukora, gifite umwihariko wihariye mu buvanganzo nyarwanda.

Inkuru igitangira, Kayizari ntiyari akunzwe cyane, ndetse bamwe bamubonaga nk'umuhanzi utavugwa cyane. Nyamara, umunsi umwe, mu gicuku, yari yicaye mu nzu ye ntoya ri mu mugi wa Ngirimata, ubwo yatekerezaga ku bihe bikomeye byari bimaze iminsi bimubaho. Mu byo yari arimo gutekereza, harimo urukundo rwamurenze akiri muto, rwaje kurangira nabi, ariko rukamusigira isomo rikomeye ku buzima.

Mu gihe cy'ijoro rimwe, Kayizari yafashe icyemezo cyo gukora indirimbo itandukanye n'izindi zose yari yarigeze akora. Yahereye ku ndirimbo z’umwimerere ziri mu mutwe we, maze yandika amagambo azimiza byinshi mu buzima bwe, ibyo yabayemo, uko yahanganye n’ibikomere ndetse n’icyizere cy'ejo hazaza. Indirimbo ye yayise "Umucyo mu Gicuku".

Iyi ndirimbo yari ifite gucurangwa amayobera y’amajwi y'ingoma zifatanye n’inanga, ikajyenda gahoro gahoro ariko ikinjira mu mico y’abantu mu buryo butangaje. Yahise ifata imitima y'abatari bake, ndetse igera ku bwumvikane n’imbere mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo. Abakunzi b'umuziki batangajwe cyane n'uko uburyohe bw'iyi ndirimbo bwakoze ku mitima yabo.

Ibinyamakuru byinshi byatangiye kumuvugaho, bitangaza ko habonetse impinduka ikomeye mu muziki nyarwanda kubera ubuhanga bw'uyu muhanzi. Amaserukiramuco yo mu karere yatangiye kumutumira, ahabwa ibikombe bitandukanye, bimuhesha no kwitabira ibitaramo mpuzamahanga. Igitaramo cy'amateka, aho yamuritse iyi ndirimbo, cyari gitohozaumutima w’umuhanzi, maze bituma igufa abari batakekwa n'ibirori bibera mu mugongo wikigo cy'umuhanzi.

Mu byumweru bike gusa, "Umucyo mu Gicuku" yabaye indirimbo yuzuye umutima wa benshi, icurangwa mu ngo no mu tubari two muri Ngirimata no hirya yaho. Ubumenyi bwa Kayizari mu kugorora no guhuza amajwi byashimwe na benshi, bituma indirimbo ye igera kure hose.

Abatumva neza uburyohe n’ubuhanga bw’iyi ndirimbo, wasangaga bamufata nk’umuntu ufite ubushobozi bwo kuririmba ibitekerezo byose, ibyishimo, agahinda n’ibyiringiro binyuze mu ijwi ry'ubuhanga rikomeye. Kubera indirimbo ye "Umucyo mu Gicuku", Kayizari yatoranyijwe nk'umuhanzi wacyo mu gihugu hose, guha ikuzo ubuhanzi nyaburanga.

Uburyo yashoboye guhuza ubuzima bwe bwite n'amarangamutima y'imbaga, bivanze n'injyana nshya zinyuranye, byamubereye intangiriro y'igihe gishya mu rugendo rwe rwo guhanga udushya, bituma yandika amateka atazibagirana mu gakino k'umuziki nyarwanda. Mu mitima ya benshi, Kayizari aguma ari icyitegererezo cy’uko umuntu ashobora guhindura isi binyuze mu bihangano bye.

Mu mujyi wa Kigali, hari umuhanzikazi witwa Aline Uwase waranzwe n'ubuhanga budasanzwe mu guhanga ibihangano bidasanzwe by'abahanzi bo mu Rwanda. Ni umuhanzikazi wamenyekanye cyane kubera igitamo cye gikomeye cyiswe "Imena y'Ibyiringiro". Iyi ndirimbo yatumye azamuka mu ntera vuba na bwangu, ndetse ikomeje kwandika amateka mu muziki nyarwanda.

Aline yari izwiho kumenya guhuza amagambo n'umuziki mu buryo butangaje, akoroshya imitima y'abamwumva. "Imena y'Ibyiringiro" yasohotse mu gihe cyari gikenewe cyane, haba mu Rwanda ndetse no ku isi hose. Yahumurizaga abantu muri ibi bihe byari byuzuye ubwoba n’amakuba.

Igitangaje kuri iyo ndirimbo ni uburyo yahurije hamwe injyana gakondo ndetse n’iyo mu mahanga, akabikora mu buryo butamenyerewe. Yaririmbye mu Kinyarwanda, ateganya ko ubutumwa buzatambuka mu buryo bwumvikana neza ku mutima wa buri wese.

Dore ko iyi ndirimbo yari itegerejwe na benshi, yagiye ku isonga ku mbuga zose zicururizwaho umuziki mu Rwanda ndetse no mu karere k’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Hari n’ibitangazamakuru byo hanze byatangiye kuyivugaho, bivuga ko irimo ubutumwa bw'umwimerere.

Aline Uwase atangira urugendo rwe rwa muzika yari umwana waciye bugufi, akabyirukira mu muryango utishoboye. Nyuma yaje kubona inkunga ya gahunda y'umushinga umufasha kugaragaza impano ye, bigira uruhare runini mu kuzamura izina rye mu ruhando rwa muzika.

Ubwitange bwa Aline mu muziki bwagaragaye cyane muri iki gitamo cya "Imena y'Ibyiringiro". Yakundaga kuvuga ko iyi ndirimbo yayihaye umutima n’ubugingo, kandi byagaragariye benshi. Mu kiganiro aheruka gutanga, yavuze ko intego ye nyamukuru yari ugukangurira abantu kutareka ibyiringiro, kandi ko umuntu wese ashobora kuba umuco utazima mu buzima bwa mugenzi we.

Mu minsi mike nyuma y'uko iyi ndirimbo isohoka, Aline yazengurutse mu bitaramo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda no mu bihugu by’ibituranyi. Yishimiraga guhura n'abafana be agatambutsa ubutumwa bwiza kandi bwongera ikizere. Ibi bitaramo byari byitabiriwe cyane kandi abantu bakarira amarira y’ibyishimo.

Ubuhanga bwa Aline Uwase n'umuhate we ntibyasize mu by’ukuri. Yakomeje gukora indirimbo nziza, zifasha abantu mu buryo bw’imitekerereze n’ubuzima bwabo bwa buri munsi. Uyu muhanzi yihaye intego yo guhindura isi binyuze mu bihangano bye, kandi yagaragaje ko bishoboka. Mu bihe biri imbere, abafana be biteze byinshi birenzeho kandi bafite icyizere ko azakomeza kubageraho no kubashimisha uko umunsi ugenda ukura.

Hari hagiye gushira igihe kirekire cyane mu kigwi cy’umuziki ubwo humvikanye inkuru idasanzwe mu bitangazamakuru. Inkuru y’umuhanzi uzwi cyane mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo, witwaga Kimenyi Alexis. Uyu muhanzi yari yaramenyekanye cyane kubera ibihangano bye byuje ubuhanga, indirimbo ze zaba iziri mu njyana ya Afrobeat, Pop, n’izindi, kandi yazisohoraga buri gihe zigakundwa cyane.

Ariko, icyatangaje cyane ni uko Kimenyi Alexis yakoze igitamo gikomeye kitari cyarigeze kibaho mu mateka y’umuziki. Iri bara ry’urukundo n’ubuzima, ryitwaga "Urukundo Ntirusaza". Igitamo cyari cyihariye kuko cyakurikiizwe mu buryo bw’amashusho bwagaragaraga mu mutambagiro muremure mu ishusho ya sinema, aho abashtari n’abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda bitabiriye.

Iki gitamo cy’umwihariko, Kimenyi Alexis yariyeguriye gukorera mu gutanga ubutumwa bwo kwimakaza amahoro n’ubumwe hagati y’abantu, anashishikariza abantu bose mu rwego rwo kwiyunga neza n’ababakomokaho, mu buryo busa neza n’uburyo yahimbye umuziki we. Yakoze ubushakashatsi buhambaye kugira ngo yerekane isano rirerisha hagati y’ihimbarwa y’umuziki n’ubushake bw’abantu bwo kubana neza kandi bubanye neza.

Indirimbo zasohotse muri iki gitamo zaje guhita ziba indirimbo z’ibihe byose, kubera ubusobanuro bwo mu butumwa bwazo n’uburyo zicuranzwe mu buhanga buhanitse. Byageze aho abakunzi b’umuziki bava mu mpande zose z’isi batangira kugura kopi z’icyo gitamo ku bwinshi, ndetse hategurwa n’ibitaramo byinshi byo kumurika icyo gitamo mu bihugu bitandukanye.

Mu gihe Kimenyi yari umuhanzi, yaranzwe no kugira umutima mwiza n’ibikorwa by’urukundo, anahugira no gufasha abatishoboye mu rwego rwo kubatera inkunga n’ikizere cyo kubaho ahazaza. Nyuma y’iki gitamo, Kimenyi Alexis yaciye agahigo ntagereranywa, aba ikitegererezo kuri benshi mu bahanzi ndetse no kuri sosiyete muri rusange.

Inkuru y’ubuzima bwe n’ibikorwa bye yaje guhitishwa muri filime ndetse no mu mbuvugo, kugira ngo imyitwarire ye n’uruhare rwe mu gutanga impinduka ikomeye ihame mu mitima ya benshi. Ariko, Kimenyi Alexis yariyarabwiwe ko ibi byamamare byose ntacyo bimaze uretse kubaka umuryango wunze ubumwe, kandi bitari guhabwa igitambo n’urukundo rutagereranywa.

Iyi ni inkuru mpimbano y'umuhanzi uzwi wakoze igitamo gikomeye.

---

**UMUHANZI W'UMWAMIKAZI: UKO AHANURAYE AMAZINA MU GIHEMBEZA**

Mu karere ka Kigali haturutse inkuru idasanzwe y'umuhanzi w'umunyarwanda, Aimé Nkurunziza, uzwi ku izina rya Aiman. Uyu muhanzi yakunzwe cyane kubera uburyo bwihariye yandika indirimbo ze, ariko ibihe bishya bimwongereyeho isura nshya mu rugendo rw'umuziki. Aimé yakoze igitamo kimaze kumenyekana ku isi hose, bikaba bivugwa ko kiri mu bihangano by'akataraboneka muri uyu mwaka.

**Ubuzima bw'Umuhanzi: Amavuko n'Urugendo rwa Muzika**

Aimé Nkurunziza yavutse mu muryango utuje mu karere ka Nyanza. Akiri umwana, yahise agaragaza impano itangaje mu guhimba no kuririmba indirimbo zciyeho. Yakuze yihugura mu gutwara amagambo no gucuranga gitari, kandi yarakunzwe cyane mu gace kose ka Nyanza kubera amajwi ye aryoshye.

Nyuma yo kwiga mu ishuri rya muzika i Kigali, Aimé yatangiye kumenyekana cyane kubera uburyo ashyira ubuzima bw'abanya-Kigali mu ndirimbo ze, by’umwihariko zifite insanganyamatsiko zijyanye n’urukundo n’umubano.

**Igitamo Gihinduye Amateka**

Iyi nkuru mpimbano ivuga ko Aimé Nkurunziza yakoze igitamo yise "Umurage W'urukundo", kikaba cyarabashije kuzamura izina rye ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Iyi ndirimbo ivuga ku rukundo rudasaza, rúbaho mu buryo bw’igitangaza n’ubuzima bw’izuba n’ukwezi.

Igitamo cyatangajwe bwa mbere mu gitaramo gikomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Arena, kikurikiranwa n’abafana baturutse imihanda yose. Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, "Umurage W'urukundo" yasangijwe n'abahanzi bakomeye barimo na Maddie Bent, umuhanzi w'icyamamare ukomoka muri Amerika, wavuze ko yanyuzwe cyane n'impano ya Aimé.

**Impinduka n'Umugambi w'Ejo Hazaza**

Nyuma y'uko igitamo, Aimé yatangiye gutumirwa mu bitaramo bitandukanye byo hirya no hino ku isi. Umuhanzi yagize ati, "Nishimira uburyo abantu bakira ubutumwa ndatanga, kandi niyemeje guhora mvuguruza urukundo n'ubwiyunge binyuze mu bihangano byanjye."

Icy'ingenzi, Aimé Nkurunziza avuga ko atazibagirwa inkomoko ye ndetse n'umuryango wamushyigikiye kuva mu bwana bwe. Arateganya kumurika alubumu ya mbere ku rwego mpuzamahanga, aho azibanda cyane ku bitsi bikomeye by'abanyarwanda ariko akoma imbere y'amasoko.

Mu gusoza, Aimé ashimira abafana n'abamushyigikiye. Ati, "Uyu ni umwanya wo kunga ubumwe n’abakunzi b'umuziki, nishimiye ko turi kumwe muri uru rugendo rw'urukundo n'icyizere."

---

Inkuru yose yashizweho n'ubuhanga bwa none mu guhanga ibitekerezo, bigatuma umuhanzi Aimé Nkurunziza yajya mu mutima w'abakunzi b'umuziki.

Mu kwezi kwa Kamena 2023, umuhanzi uzwi cyane witwa Amélie Amani yakoze igitaramo gikomeye cyasize inkuru idasanzwe mu mateka y'umuziki wa Afurika. Amélie, afite izina rikomeye mu njyana ya Afrobeat, yateguye iki gitaramo mu mujyi w'i Dakar muri Senegal, aho abantu bagera ku bihumbi makumyabiri bari bateraniye muri stade ya Léopold Sédar Senghor, harimo n'abafana baturutse imihanda yose y'isi.

Amélie Amani, ufite inkomoko mu gihugu cya Côte d'Ivoire, yari amaze ukwezi kose ategura iki gitaramo yise "Ubumuntu bwa Muzika" mu rwego rwo gusakaza ubutumwa bw'urukundo n'ubumwe. Yahisemo gutumira abaririmbyi bubatse izina ku rwego mpuzamahanga barimo n’abo mu njyana zitandukanye, harimo n’umunyabigwi wo muri Jamaica, Sean Kingston, na Angelique Kidjo ufite inkomoko mu Burundi.

Imyiteguro y’iki gitaramo yari idasanzwe; ikibuga cya stade cyari cyahinduwe nk’ikirwa cy’umunezero, kikaba cyarimo amatara y'umurabyo n'imurikagurisha ry'ubugeni bw’Abanyafurika. Ku munsi nyir'izina, igitaramo cyatangiye ku isaha ya saa kumi n'ebyiri z'umugoroba, maze Amélie Amani asohoka ku rubyiniro arikumwe n’ababyinnyi be b’impano, atangirana indirimbo ye imaze kwamamara cyane yitwa "Kwizera."

Mu gihe cy'amasaha atatu adahagarara, umucyo wabusaga n'amajwi afatanya kwerekanwa birimo ubuhanga bwisumbuye. Amélie yaririmbye indirimbo ze zagiye zikundwa mu buryo budasanzwe, bifatanya n'ubutumwa bwo kuzamura umutima w’abagize isi. Byageze aho maze afatanya na Sean Kingston kuririmba ya ndirimbo inshuti ya bose "Beautiful Girls," icyarimwe abantu bose bahaguruka ikibuga giceza, umuziki ubahuza nk'umuryango umwe.

Ni inkuru idasanzwe kuko iki gitaramo cyaranzwe n’amashimwe aturuka mu mpande zose z’isi ndetse n’ibinyamakuru bikomeye byandika ku muziki, birimo na Billboard na Rolling Stone, byabihereye amanota y’inyongera ku ndirimbo z'uyu muhanzi. Umunsi wakurikiyeho, Amélie yagaragaje ko yishimiye cyane ukuntu abanyarwanda n'abanyamahanga bamushyigikiye, ndetse ashimangira ko umuziki we ari umurage w'ubumuntu, impamvu yo gukomeza gukora ibidasanzwe.

Iki gitaramo cyasize imurikwa rikomeye ku muziki wa Amélie Amani, bivugwa ko yitegura kujya ku mugabane w'u Burayi ndetse no muri Amerika mu ihuriro ry’ibitaramo bizwi cyane ku izina rya "World Harmony Tour." Ubu Amélie ari mu nzira zo guhuza abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye binyuze mu muziki, mpamo y’ingenzi: kwishima, gukundana no kubaha.

Iyi nkuru irerekana ubuhanga n’imbaraga z’umuhanzi uvuga rumwe n’abantu benshi, yambika umuziki wa Afurika ikamba ku ruhando mpuzamahanga. Ariko kandi, irashimangira ko n'inkuru mpimbano zishobora guhinduka ibintu bifatika igihe dukomeje kwizera n’inzozi.

Umwanditsi: [Izina ry'Umwanditsi]

**Inkuru Ndende: Urugendo rw'Umuhanzi Uzwi mu Gukora Igitamo "Impinduramatwara y'Umuziki"**

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi igihumbi, mu murwa mukuru Kigali, hatangiriye inkuru ihambaye y'umuhanzi uzwi ku izina rya Kizito Mwene Mugenzi. Kizito ni izina ritangaza abagishidikanya ku iterambere ry'umuziki nyarwanda. Imyaka igera kuri cumi yari ishize adakoma ku byuma by'umuziki mu buryo buhebuje, ndetse abantu benshi bamufataga nk'uwacogoye. Ariko mu ibanga rikomeye, yari arimo gutegura icyo yise igitamo cye cy'imbonekarimwe, yacyise "Impinduramatwara y'Umuziki".

Uyu muhanzi w'icyubahiro azwiho kuba yarashishikarije benshi gukunda umuziki ndukaraho no kwigisha indangagaciro z'umuco w'u Rwanda biciye mu nganzo ye. Nyuma y’ubwitabire buke bw'umuziki we kuva mu 2010, yagiye yongera ubushobozi bwe mu ngeri zitandukanye z'umuziki mu rwego rwo gukusanya ubuhanga n'ubumenyi bitandukanye azashyira mu gitabo cye gishya.

"Igitamo "Impinduramatwara y'Umuziki" ni igihangano cy'izina rikomeye kandi rizandikwa mu mateka," yagize ati mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru. "Natekereje iki gitabo igihe kinini, nkifatanya n'abahanga mu muziki baturutse imihanda yose, tugakora amasaha adashira tugamije kuvumbura amajwi mashya n'imbyino zidashira."

Igihe cyo kumurika iki gitabo cyari gikomeye. Abantu baturutse imihanda yose y’igihugu baje gushyigikira no kureba ibintu bidasanzwe. Kizito yagejeje ku bitabiriye urugwiro rudasanzwe hamwe n'ubuhanga bwe mu ndirimbo zamaze kubaka amateka nk'izina rya buri wese uzaririmba indirimbo zo muri iki gitabo, bazajya babikora bifashishije indangururamajwi, ibyuma bikubita byinshi n'amajwi y'abahimbaza Imana bakomeye.

Mu gihe abateguye iki gitaramo bari bafashe akanya ko guhagarika umuziki, Kizito yaje ku rubyiniro mu buryo bw’ibanga, atungura abantu bose, yambaye umwambaro wa gakondo ugaragaza amasano ye n'amateka ya bene wabo. Uko umuziki wumvikanaga, ni nako imitima ya benshi yakangukaga, ubwuzu n'amarangamutima byuzura abari bitabiriye igitaramo.

Mu gitaramo abandi bahanzi benshi b'imena barimo abacuranzi, ababyinnyi, n’abaririmbyi bazwi mu Rwanda ndetse n’abo mu karere k’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba batumiwe kugira ngo batange ubunararibonye bwabo mu gukomeza gushimisha abayitabiriye. Birashoboka ko yari inzira Kizito yari yarateguye yo kwerekana ko umuziki ari isano rihambaye rihuza abantu bose.

Nyuma y'iki gitaramo, Kizito Mwene Mugenzi yamenyekanye ku rwego mpuzamahanga, atangira umugambi wo gukomeza guha umuziki nyarwanda isura nshya mu masoko y’isi yose, ndetse agora inzira ku bahanzi bashya benshi.

"Impinduramatwara y'Umuziki" yazanye impinduka ku buryo abahanzi bsobanura indangagaciro z'umuco n'ubuzima binyuze mu nganzo. Ku bakunda umuziki, kiriya gitabo cyabaye nk'impano idashobora kwibagirana, ndetse kugeza n'uyu munsi kiracyafite uruhare runini mu gutuma abantu bishimira umuziki mu buryo buhambaye kandi buzasigara mu mitima yabo ubuziraherezo.

Mu gihugu cya Nyampinga, cyamenyekanye ku isi yose ku bw'ubuhanzi n'umuco byabo bitangaje, uwitwa Karengera Harerimana yabaye ikirangirire bitewe n'igitamo yise "Imena ry'Ibyiringiro". Uyu muhanzi, wavutse mu mugi wa Gicurasi, yakunze guhanga ibihangano birimo ubutumwa bwimbitse kandi bijyanye n'ibibazo by'ibihe turimo.

"Imena ry'Ibyiringiro" yatangiye guhimbwa mu bihe byari bigoye mu gihugu. Harerimana yari afite intego yo gushishikariza urubyiruko kutagwa mu bwigunge no kumva ko bashoboye guhindura isi. Iyo album yari yubakiye ku ntero igira iti: "Ninde uzatuvura niba bitari twe ubwacu?" Ni igitamo cyaririmbye ku buryo buhambaye, kigaruka ku ngingo z'imibereho y'abantu, ikibazo cy'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, n'urukundo rw'umuryango.

Mu gihe gito, "Imena ry'Ibyiringiro" yabaye indirimbo y'umwaka, ihabwa ibihembo bikomeye byo mu karere ndetse no ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ibi byatumye Harerimana atumirwa mu birori bikomeye, aserukira igihugu cye mu mahanga, ndetse yishyirwa mu nama zikomeye zigamije iterambere.

Ubu, Harerimana akomeje urugendo rwe rwo guteza imbere umuziki ufitiye akamaro sosiyete, yerekana uburyo ubuhanzi bufite ubushobozi bwo guhindura imitekerereze no guharanira amahoro. Ageze mu nama mpuzamahanga, abahanzi hirya no hino ku isi bemeje ko igitamo cye cyababereye isoko y'ibyiringiro ndetse n'ihumure mu bihe by'amage.

Mu minsi iri imbere, Harerimana yitegura gukora ingendo hirya no hino ku isi kugira ngo akomeze gusangiza abantu urugendo rwe, azamure impano z'urubyiruko, kandi abe icyitegererezo cy'uko umuhanzi ashobora kugira uruhare mu mibereho myiza ya sosiyete. Nk'uko bigaragara, "Imena ry'Ibyiringiro" izakomeza kuba intandaro yo guha abantu imbaraga zo kwiyubaka no guhanga udushya twateza imbere umuryango nyarwanda ndetse n'isi yose.

Mu mwaka wa 2025, isi yose yaratunguwe ubwo hatangazwaga igitamo cy'indirimbo cy'umuhanzi w'umunyarwanda wakoreraga ibihangano bye mu ibanga, akamenyekana ku izina rya Kwizera Melodie. Yari asanzwe azwi cyane mu Rwanda no muri Afurika yo hagati kubera indirimbo nziza zari ziganjemo ubutumwa bukomeye ndetse n'amajwi ye ashyushye. Ariko ibyo yakoze muri uwo mwaka byarenze kure ibyo yari amazemo imyaka.

Kwizera Melodie yashinze igitamo gikomeye cyane yise "Ubutatu Bwera," kikaba cyari gikubiyemo indirimbo 30 zose zari zihuje umudiho n'ubutumwa bwubaka kandi bufite imbaraga. Iki gitamo cyakozwe mu buryo bwa kijyambere ariko hagumwamo umwimerere ndetse n'imbyino z'umwihariko w’akarande nyafurika. Mu gutunganya iki gitamo, Kwizera yagiye ahitamo gukorana n’abahanga mu muziki bazwi ku rwego mpuzamahanga, nka Jacob Collier na Angelique Kidjo, bagira uruhare mu guhuza umwimerere w'indirimbo ze n'amajwi akomeye ya muzika y'icyi gihe.

Igitamo "Ubutatu Bwera" cyatanze umusaruro ukomeye, ku buryo cyahise kiyobora urutonde rw’indirimbo zigezweho mu Rwanda no mu karere muri rusange. Indirimbo yambere yahise ikundwa cyane yitwaga “Ijwi ry’Umunezero,” itsinda ibihembo bitandukanye harimo n’icyo mu katega k’indirimbo nziza ifite ubutumwa bw’amahoro mu bihembo bya MTV Africa Music Awards.

Igitamo cya Kwizera MBWERA cyarushijeho kumenyekana ubwo yateguraga igitaramo kidasanzwe i Kigali, aho yahurije hamwe abaririmbyi n'abacuranzi bakomeye baturutse mu bihugu binyuranye. Iki gitaramo cyitwaga "Ijwi rya Afurika," cyabaye icy’imbonekarimwe maze gituma anamenyekana ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Amashusho y'icyo gitaramo yacicikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, yatumye abafana b’umuziki bamuvumbura haba mu Burayi, Amerika, no muri Aziya.

Mu gihe gito gusa, Kwizera Melodie yahawe akazi ko gukorera ibihangano mu bitaramo by’abahanzi bazwi ku isi, ndetse afite gahunda yo kwitabira ibitaramo bikomeye byitwa "Coachella" muri Amerika no mu Burayi, aho azitabira "Glastonbury Festival."

Igitamo "Ubutatu Bwera" ntikiri indirimbo gusa, ahubwo cyahinduye uburyo abantu babona umuziki nyafurika; kiranakomeza gucurangwa hirya no hino muri za radio na televiziyo, ndetse kikaba gikomeje kwigisha no gushishikariza urubyiruko rwo muri Afurika yose gukomeza gushimangira umuco bifashishije impano z'amateka yabo. Byasize umugani kandi byatanze icyizere n'umunezero ku bihumbi by’abafana b’umuziki, ndetse Kwizera Melodie akomeza kwemeza benshi ko ari umwe mu bahanzi batanga icyerekezo gishya mu gihugu no mu karere no ku rwego rw’isi.
